description: Try our easy to follow Smoked Salmon Sushi Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Smoked Salmon Sushi Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 250g sushi rice, well rinsed and very well drained
2 tbs caster sugar (plus an extra pinch)
2 tsp fresh root ginger, finely grated
2 tbs nori sheets, toasted and thinly sliced (to garnish)

recipeInstructions.text: Place the rice in a saucepan, pour over the measurement water and season with salt. Bring to the boil, then cook for 10-12 minutes until most of the water has boiled away and small craters appear in the rice. Cover with a tight-fitting lid and leave to steam off the heat for 5 minutes. Meanwhile, mix together 4 tablespoons of the vinegar and the 2 tablespoons sugar until the sugar has dissolved.

Tip the rice on to a baking sheet. Pour over the vinegar mixture and use a spatula to stir through in a slicing motion until the rice looks glossy. Cover with damp kitchen paper and leave to cool a little.
Cook the sesame seeds in a small dry, frying pan over a low heat until lightly browned.

Mix together the remaining vinegar, soy sauce, ginger and the pinch of sugar. Spoon the rice into serving bowls. Arrange the avocado, smoked salmon and spring onions on top. Drizzle over the dressing. Cut the toasted nori into thin strips and scatter over with the sesame seeds.
